title: Pegu Club Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Pegu Club Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
gin
3/4
ounce
lime juice
3/4
ounce
curaçao
1
dash
Angostura bitters
1
dash
orange bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker, and fill with ice. Shake well, and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker and strainer
Gin
